entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning and early this afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries changing to a few flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
